column4: anyone know where shutdown errors are located (such as why a computer shuts down by itself)?
did it shut down gracefully, or just power down hard?
somewhat gracefully (x just quit) but then regulary

it really shouldn't do that unless you've /asked/ it to. You're sure nothing was pressed up against the computer's power button, right? ...if there was an unusual event that would cause that, it'd probably be in /var/log/syslog.
